mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gookie WHERE e_mail = #{eMail} AND mona_cd = #{monaCd}
SELECT orig_nm,e_mail,poly_nm,hg_nm,mona_cd FROM gookie order by hg_nm

SELECT A.mona_cd , A.con_count , A.total_count , Round(A.con_count/A.total_count*100) AS rate , gk.hg_nm , gk.poly_nm , gk.e_mail FROM( SELECT rp.mona_cd , count(cr.reply_id) AS con_count , count(rp.reply_id) AS total_count FROM reply rp left outer JOIN ( SELECT reply_id , COUNT(reply_id) AS count FROM congress_reply GROUP BY reply_id ) cr ON cr.reply_id = rp.reply_id GROUP BY mona_cd )A
INNER JOIN gookie gk ON gk.mona_cd = A.mona_cd ORDER BY rate desc LIMIT 0,5
